title: In Afghan Peace Talks, the Taliban Gain Legitimacy While Pursuing War
content:
1. In Afghan Peace Talks, the Taliban Gain Legitimacy While Pursuing War  The Wall Street Journal
  2. More than 1,000 Afghan soldiers flee into Tajikistan as Taliban extends control, Tajik officials say  The Washington Post
  3. Afghan forces plan counteroffensive  Yahoo News
  4. Afghan Govt Vows to Retake Districts from Taliban | TOLOnews  TOLOnews
  5. Taliban surges as Biden pulls US troops out of Afghanistan, with experts warning of 'foreign policy disaster'  Fox News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: アフガン和平交渉では、タリバンは戦争をしながら正統性を獲得している。
